ing: 3 cups mashed pomegranate pulp, light-colored membrane removed
des: "An elegant dessert. Preparation Time: 10 minutes. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association."
ins: In a medium-size mixing bowl, combine pomegranate pulp, rose water, lemon juice, and sugar and chill for several hours. Serve chilled in dessert dishes.
